questions: You're writing in your personal journal about how your weekend went. What do you write?
You're daydreaming on a solo walk about your upcoming vacation. What do you think about?
You're lying in bed planning what to cook this week. What comes to mind?
You're talking to yourself while cleaning, thinking about a hobby you want to pick up. What do you say?
You're on a long drive thinking about places you'd like to visit someday. What do you daydream about?
You're writing morning pages about how you're feeling today. What comes out?
You're sitting in your parked car after errands, decompressing. What are you thinking about?
You're jotting notes about a book you just finished. What do you write?
